channel.title: Club Meet on Westview Bridge Club
channel.description: Recent content in Club Meet on Westview Bridge Club

item.title: Not Last in a Real Tournament
item.description: This was Chris' first official tournament and we couldn’t wait to work together to play against real semi-pros and amateurs.

item.title: The Streak Continues
item.description: Today we experiment with playing rubber bridge. Less to say Chris’s partnership gets all the good hands…

item.title: Chris Wins Again!
item.description: Today Kishore and Chris win 3 of their 4 hands, accumulating enough points to win the bridge tournmanet.

item.title: Our First Bridge Champion
item.description: This week, in our individuals tournament, Chris comes out on top! Chris has regularly been our best player and his luck from last week is reversed this time.

item.title: Six and O!
item.description: A terrible day for Chris and Siddesh, who lost points every round. For the first 4 they had terrible hands, and for the last 2 hands they went down.

item.title: Snow Day Wednesday: The "Perfect Win Rate"
item.description: This was our best meet yet, we had enough people show up to play duplicate Bridge and everybody had a blast. After 2 back and forth rounds, the team Virinchi, Rehaan, Meet and Lohit ended up coming out on top.

item.title: First Duplicate Bridge
item.description: This was our best meet yet, we had enough people show up to play duplicate Bridge and everybody had a blast. After 2 back and forth rounds, the team Virinchi, Rehaan, Meet and Lohit ended up coming out on top.

item.title: Almost Duplicate Bridge
item.description: We had a great meeting, now with multiple people knowledgable people who know how to play Bridge, and a full 8 people at the end, but not enough time. If we have the full 8 people from the start next time, we can play duplicate bridge.

item.title: Finals Week
item.description: Chris was sick today, but we still had enough players to make a table of 4 and play for a bit. This week being finals week, a few of the other clubs like Chess club were cancelled so we also had Bhavin and Jerry check in earlier to play a few rounds of Bridge with us.

item.title: 1/9/2023 Meeting and First BBO Tournament
item.description: Great first meeting back from winter break! More new members, some solid practice rounds and First Bridge Base Online Tournaments.

item.title: First Blog Post-12/12/2022 Meeting
item.description: Hello and welcome to our Bridge club! This is our first blog of a bridge club meeting.
